title: That Girl from Boston
description: From Robert Rimmer, the author of The Harrod Experiment and Proposition 31 brings you a novel about the newest rules for the oldest game of all. Willa Starch has the most sought-after breasts and the fairest white backside in greater Boston. It's just a matter of time until someone finds the secret fuse that ignites the love bomb known as Willa Starch.
author: Robert H. Rimmer
